item.title: Take screenshots in emacs org mode with flameshot
item.description: Figure 1: Screencast showing flameshot in action Setup Enable the org layer in your .spacemacs dotspacemacs-configuration-layers dotspacemacs-configuration-layers '(org) Install flameshot sudo pacman -S flameshot Add line below to your .spacemacs custom-set-variables (custom-set-variables '(org-download-screenshot-method "flameshot gui --raw > %s")) Usage Take your screenshot , i s or M-x org-download-screenshot in org mode Edit your screenshot on the fly or.. don’t Hit RET to insert your screenshot into your org file
